query:
INSERT INTO test_questions (testId, questionText, questionType, options, correctAnswer, explanation, points, difficulty, isActive) VALUES 
(1, 'According to NIST AI RMF, which characteristic relates to AI systems operating reliably within defined conditions?', 'multiple_choice', '[{"id":"A","text":"Explainability"},{"id":"B","text":"Fairness"},{"id":"C","text":"Robustness"},{"id":"D","text":"Accountability"}]', 'C', 'Robustness in the NIST AI RMF refers to the ability of an AI system to maintain its level of performance under various conditions, including adversarial inputs, data drift, and unexpected operational scenarios.', 1, 'medium', true),
(1, 'The NIST AI RMF MAP function includes which of the following activities?', 'multiple_choice', '[{"id":"A","text":"Setting organizational AI policies"},{"id":"B","text":"Categorizing AI systems and identifying potential impacts"},{"id":"C","text":"Implementing technical controls"},{"id":"D","text":"Conducting post-incident reviews"}]', 'B', 'The MAP function involves understanding the AI system context, categorizing systems, identifying stakeholders, and determining potential positive and negative impacts across the AI lifecycle.', 1, 'medium', true),
(1, 'According to NIST, which trustworthy AI characteristic ensures that AI decisions can be understood by humans?', 'multiple_choice', '[{"id":"A","text":"Privacy"},{"id":"B","text":"Explainability"},{"id":"C","text":"Security"},{"id":"D","text":"Validity"}]', 'B', 'Explainability (also called interpretability) ensures that AI system outputs and decision-making processes can be understood by humans, enabling appropriate trust, oversight, and accountability.', 1, 'easy', true),
(1, 'The NIST AI RMF MANAGE function includes which activity?', 'multiple_choice', '[{"id":"A","text":"Identifying AI system stakeholders"},{"id":"B","text":"Prioritizing risks and implementing mitigation strategies"},{"id":"C","text":"Defining organizational AI policies"},{"id":"D","text":"Measuring AI system accuracy"}]', 'B', 'The MANAGE function involves prioritizing identified risks, allocating resources, implementing mitigation strategies, and taking action to address AI risks based on the organization''s risk tolerance.', 1, 'medium', true),
(1, 'What is TC260 in the context of AI governance?', 'multiple_choice', '[{"id":"A","text":"A European AI certification body"},{"id":"B","text":"China''s National Information Security Standardization Technical Committee"},{"id":"C","text":"A US federal AI agency"},{"id":"D","text":"An international AI standards organization"}]', 'B', 'TC260 (National Information Security Standardization Technical Committee) is China''s primary body for developing cybersecurity and AI safety standards, including the AI Safety Governance Framework.', 1, 'medium', true);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute INSERT INTO test_questions (testId, questionText, questionType, options, correctAnswer, explanation, points, difficulty, isActive) VALUES 
(1, 'According to NIST AI RMF, which characteristic relates to AI systems operating reliably within defined conditions?', 'multiple_choice', '[{"id":"A","text":"Explainability"},{"id":"B","text":"Fairness"},{"id":"C","text":"Robustness"},{"id":"D","text":"Accountability"}]', 'C', 'Robustness in the NIST AI RMF refers to the ability of an AI system to maintain its level of performance under various conditions, including adversarial inputs, data drift, and unexpected operational scenarios.', 1, 'medium', true),
(1, 'The NIST AI RMF MAP function includes which of the following activities?', 'multiple_choice', '[{"id":"A","text":"Setting organizational AI policies"},{"id":"B","text":"Categorizing AI systems and identifying potential impacts"},{"id":"C","text":"Implementing technical controls"},{"id":"D","text":"Conducting post-incident reviews"}]', 'B', 'The MAP function involves understanding the AI system context, categorizing systems, identifying stakeholders, and determining potential positive and negative impacts across the AI lifecycle.', 1, 'medium', true),
(1, 'According to NIST, which trustworthy AI characteristic ensures that AI decisions can be understood by humans?', 'multiple_choice', '[{"id":"A","text":"Privacy"},{"id":"B","text":"Explainability"},{"id":"C","text":"Security"},{"id":"D","text":"Validity"}]', 'B', 'Explainability (also called interpretability) ensures that AI system outputs and decision-making processes can be understood by humans, enabling appropriate trust, oversight, and accountability.', 1, 'easy', true),
(1, 'The NIST AI RMF MANAGE function includes which activity?', 'multiple_choice', '[{"id":"A","text":"Identifying AI system stakeholders"},{"id":"B","text":"Prioritizing risks and implementing mitigation strategies"},{"id":"C","text":"Defining organizational AI policies"},{"id":"D","text":"Measuring AI system accuracy"}]', 'B', 'The MANAGE function involves prioritizing identified risks, allocating resources, implementing mitigation strategies, and taking action to address AI risks based on the organization''s risk tolerance.', 1, 'medium', true),
(1, 'What is TC260 in the context of AI governance?', 'multiple_choice', '[{"id":"A","text":"A European AI certification body"},{"id":"B","text":"China''s National Information Security Standardization Technical Committee"},{"id":"C","text":"A US federal AI agency"},{"id":"D","text":"An international AI standards organization"}]', 'B', 'TC260 (National Information Security Standardization Technical Committee) is China''s primary body for developing cybersecurity and AI safety standards, including the AI Safety Governance Framework.', 1, 'medium', true);
